title: is it legal to sell your League account?
body: just wondering if I can sell my account cause I don't play league anymore but i have a lot of stuff on there and i did waste a lot of money

replies.body: No!  Account sales or trading is not supported, and doing so will result in suspension.  Keep your account safe, and it's fine to leave it inactive.  You'll have it whenever you decide to play again!
It's against the ToS if that's what you're asking. But you're not gonna get fined or hauled off to jail.
